data.name: Gallis the Star Beast
data.desc: You can reveal this card in your hand; send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard, then, if it was a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 200 and Special Summon this card from your hand, otherwise destroy this card.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
